description: The perfect M car. The E46 M3's S54 inline-six revs to 8000 RPM with a mechanical urgency that modern turbo engines can't replicate. Balanced chassis, communicative steering, and enough power to be exciting without being overwhelming â€” this is the benchmark every sport sedan is measured against.
lore: BMW purists will argue about which M car is the greatest until the heat death of the universe. But put them behind the wheel of an E46 M3 on a canyon road at dawn, and the argument ends. This is the one.
